name: Danganronpa: Restrained Nature CHAPTER 1 DEADLY LIFE
name_original: Danganronpa: Restrained Nature CHAPTER 1 DEADLY LIFE
description:
After finding the butchered body of her friend floating in the middle of the lake, Yuna Kaigosha along with the other Ultimates must now gather clues and find out which one of her friends is the killer, and sacrifice their life in order for everybody else to survive. Will the blackened succeed in deceiving them or will Yuna manage to tear apart their lies?

THIS FANGAME IS BASED ON SPIKE CHUNSOFT'S "DANGANRONPA" SERIES. ALL COPYRIGHTS BELONG TO SPIKE CHUNSOFT AND THIS GAME WILL NOT BE USED FOR ANY COMMERCIAL PURPOSES

This game may contain some scenes that may be disturbing for some people, so player discretion is advised
